page.title: 09Annard Crafts,Church Lench
page.content: Annard Crafts started as a hobby in the home of the owner, a Bromsgrove accountant,who had to give up work due to illness.Having some knowledge of carpet making, he started work making hand crafted rugs ,of natural fibres, designed by his wife.They started hand knitted garments to use up excess wool from the carpets,using outworkers to make up the knitwear.The designs are all exclusive to Annard crafts. In 1980 they moved to Handgate Farm in Church Lench where they have workrooms,showrooms and a shop as well as a home.They produce rugs and huge carpet tapestries,knitware,wool mohair sweaters,spinning wheels,fleeces and mohair Knit-Kits. Visitors are welcome to watch the work and get advice on all aspects of knitting and rug making.
